info.title: Welcome to estuve.eu!
info.content: Here you can explore your GPX tracks interactively.

clear.message: Are you sure you want to remove all the data?
clear.help: Clear all the data and start again.

download.help: Download a backup of everything you have created here.

upload.alert: Mixing file types is not supported. You can select a list of GPX files or a .bin file, but not both
upload.help: Use this button to upload your GPX tracks (you might select multiple). You can also use it to upload the estuve.bin file generated by the download button.
